overview: Min-cheol and Su-hee go to say hello to Min-cheol's father (Daesik) ahead of their wedding.  Dae-sik welcomes her prospective daughter-in-law, Soo-hee, and Soo-hee also considers her benevolent Dae-sik a good person.  However, due to personality differences before marriage, Min-cheol and Su-hee broke up... Soo-hee, who was only preparing for her wedding, soon went through hardships... .. She gets to work in the kissing room where Soo-hee's old friend and friend Min-joo works.  Just like one day, Soo-hee is waiting for her guest in her kissing room... . She encounters Dae-shik, her guest, who comes through the door of the kissing room…
title: Big boobs girlfriend
